title: Tweeetter
description: Social media Web App built with React. Users can comment, like posts and add new tweets.

title: E-Buy
description: E-commerce website powered by Ebay Finding API

title: Flack
description: Slack-like application based on Flask and Socket-IO. Users can register, create channels, chat and view who is online.

title: This Portfolio
description: I've strived to make it fast and maintainable above all else. it produces static files with Gatsby and can be easily updated by modifying a JSON file
